RelatedSentence: ( May 19 , 2014 ) - Driver Kurt Busch escaped injury after crashing during practice for the Indianapolis 500 Monday afternoon .
Bush , no. 26 of Suretone Honda , got loose entering Turn 2 and made hard contact with the SAFER Barrier in Turn 2 , said IndyCar officials .
Bush , no. 26 of Suretone Honda , got loose entering Turn 2 and made hard contact with the SAFER Barrier in Turn 2 , said IndyCar officials .
The crash sparked a small fire , and Busch 's vehicle did a half spin before coming to rest in the grass area at the exit of Turn 2 .

He was uninjured and cleared to drive .
